foreword: Foreword from Kou Yamada, Professor of Gunma University, Japan.
foreword_content:
Dear readers,
I would like to recommend The Advances in Electronic and Electric Engineering (AEEE) Journal to you for sharing your academic research outcomes. AEEE is a prestigious journal that publishes high quality papers in the fields of electrical and electronic engineering. AEEE is indexed included in WoS, SCOPUS, SJR, and others. Since AEEE is an Open Access journal, all papers are freely accessible via online. Therefore, researchers and stakeholders will invite to submit their research papers for publication in the AEEE Journal and refer papers in the AEEE journal.
